tool_description:
Send And Receive WhatsApp Bulk Messages(WhatsApp Marketing Messages) Through Whatsapp Business API Gateway(WhatsApp Green Tick Verification). For the Purpose Of Sending Notifications, OTPs, Or Anything Else Using Our WhatsApp Business API (WhatsApp Official API) Or WhatsApp OTP API and WhatsApp Chatbot. For Demo Contact Us(+91-7976724242) Or Register Here - http://sms.getitsms.com/signup 

Shopify Integration - https://apps.shopify.com/wpplugins
name: GetItSMS WhatsApp APIs
title: GetItSMS WhatsApp APIs

api_list.name: GetIT SMS WHATSAPP API
api_list.description: We are providing bulk whatsapp sms services.To use our whatsapp bulk sms  service you need api key.Go through our application and get our service.

utterances.utterance: Send a WhatsApp message to 919876543210 with the text 'Hello, your order has been shipped!' using id 45.

parameters.your_message: Hello, your order has been shipped!

utterances.utterance: Please send the message 'Your OTP is 123456' to the number 918765432109 with id 45.
Send a bulk WhatsApp notification to 919999999999 saying 'Flash sale starts now!' with id 45.
Send the message 'Reminder: Your appointment is tomorrow at 10 AM' to 917654321098 using id 45.

parameters.your_message: Reminder: Your appointment is tomorrow at 10 AM

utterances.utterance: Send WhatsApp message 'Welcome to our service!' to 919123456789 with id 45.
Send a WhatsApp message to 919876543210 with the content 'Your package will arrive today' using id 45.
Send the message 'Thank you for your purchase!' to 918888888888 with id 45.
Send WhatsApp message 'Your subscription has been renewed' to 919777777777 using id 45.
Send a WhatsApp message to 919555555555 with the text 'Please verify your email address' and id 45.
Send the message 'Your event starts in 1 hour' to 919444444444 with id 45.
